General.Name: Tibet Huayu Mining Co Ltd
General.Description: Tibet Huayu Mining Co., Ltd. engages in mining, processing, exploration, and sale of lead, zinc, copper, and other nonferrous metals in China. It engages in the solid mineral exploration; non-ferrous metal trading; sale of mining equipment; mineral information consulting services; experimental equipment; chemical products; building materials trading; and house leasing businesses. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Lhasa, China.

6.Name: Mr. Wenzheng  Xie
6.Title: Deputy GM & VP of Overseas Investment
